t: Brands are Branching Out from the Amazon Marketplace - Retail TouchPoints

t: ​Café Amazon branching out | Phnom Penh Post
s: Café Amazon, the coffee shop brand of Thai oil giant PTT, has become one of the fastest-growing chains in Cambodia since arriving four years ago, with new outlets opening both inside PTT petrol stations and as franchised stand-alone shops.
